title: Google\Cloud\Video\Stitcher\V1\VodSessionAd
name: VodSessionAd
description:
Metadata for an inserted ad in a VOD session.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.video.stitcher.v1.VodSessionAd

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.companion_ads
params.description: Metadata of companion ads associated with the ad.

params.name: data.activity_events
params.description: The list of progress tracking events for the ad break. These can be of the following IAB types: MUTE, UNMUTE, PAUSE, CLICK, CLICK_THROUGH, REWIND, RESUME, ERROR, FULLSCREEN, EXIT_FULLSCREEN, EXPAND, COLLAPSE, ACCEPT_INVITATION_LINEAR, CLOSE_LINEAR, SKIP.
